functions.name: generateRecipe
functions.description: Generates a recipe with a name, method, list of ingredients with quantities, and cooking time.

name.description: A very creative name for the recipe, something a reader wouldn't expect. Limited to 30 characters

items.description: Represents a single ingredient, specifying its name, quantity, and unit of measurement.

ingredient.description: The name exactly as it appeared in the ingredient list.

quantity.description: The quantity of the ingredient required. Always use short notation such a g, kg, ml, etc. Round up to the nearest 5 if using grams.

ingredients.description: An array of ingredients for the recipe.

items.description: A step in the method to prepare the recipe.

cookingTime.description: The time it takes to cook the recipe, in minutes.

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Feta Fantasy Veggie Medley","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Feta Cheese Sheep","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":30},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Papaya 160 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Mustard powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":1}],"method":["Slice the cherry tomatoes and carrots into bite-sized pieces.","Cut the feta cheese into small cubes.","In a bowl, whisk together a pinch of cayenne pepper, mustard powder, olive oil, and basil to create a light dressing.","Toss the spinach, cherry tomatoes, and carrots in the dressing until evenly coated.","Gently fold in the feta cheese, being careful not to break the cubes.","Serve the veggie medley on a piece of crispy rye bread, with papaya slices on the side for a sweet contrast."],"cookingTime":10,"imagePrompt":"A colorful plate of Feta Fantasy Veggie Medley served on crispy rye bread with a side of sliced papaya, featuring cubes of feta cheese, spinach leaves, cherry tomatoes, and carrot pieces, all tossed in a dressing seasoned with a pinch of cayenne pepper, mustard powder, olive oil, and basil."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spice Infusion Salad","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"firm","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lollo Rosso Lettuce","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Oak Leaf Lettuce","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":30},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Apricot dried 30 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil forfrying","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Paprika Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curry Leaf","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5}],"method":["Slice the 'firm' ingredient into thin strips.","Heat the coconut oil in a pan over medium heat and fry the strips until golden and crisp. Set them aside to cool.","In a dry pan, lightly toast the paprika powder, curry leaf, cumin powder, and ginger until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.","Wash the Lollo Rosso Lettuce and Red Oak Leaf Lettuce, then tear into bite-size pieces and place them in a large salad bowl.","Dice the dried apricot and add it to the salad bowl.","Prepare a dressing by whisking together the toasted spice mix, flax seed oil, lemon juice, and crushed garlic. Season with salt and pepper to taste.","Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.","Toast the rye bread and cut it into small cubes to make croutons.","Top the salad with the fried 'firm' strips and croutons just before serving.","Serve the Spice Infusion Salad immediately, while the 'firm' strips and croutons are still crispy."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A colorful salad consisting of green Lollo Rosso Lettuce, red Red Oak Leaf Lettuce, golden fried 'firm' ingredient strips, toasted spices including paprika, curry leaf, cumin, and ginger, diced dried apricot, homemade croutons made from wholegrain rye bread, all dressed with a flax seed oil and lemon dressing in a decorative bowl."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Beanorama Botanical Bounty","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Black Eyed Beans","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":75},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Mango 165 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Chilli","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Dill","quantity":5}],"method":["Soak the black eyed beans overnight or for at least 8 hours in cold water.","Drain and rinse the beans. Add them to a saucepan with water covering them by a couple of inches. Bring to a boil and then simmer for 45 minutes or until tender.","While the beans are cooking, cut the broccoli and carrots into small florets and slices respectively and steam them until al dente.","Peel and slice the mango, chop the dill, and prepare the crispy rye bread.","Once the beans are tender, drain them and keep aside.","Heat a small amount of water in a skillet and sauté the chilli and dill for a few minutes.","Add the steamed broccoli, carrots, and mango to the skillet and stir well.","Finally, add the cooked black eyed beans and mix everything together gently.","Serve the Beanorama Botanical Bounty with a side of crispy rye bread for a satisfying and wholesome lunch."],"cookingTime":60,"imagePrompt":"A plate filled with a colorful and nutritious medley of black eyed beans, steamed broccoli and carrots, fresh mango slices, and a side of crispy rye bread."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Savory Mutton Breakfast Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mutton","quantity":100},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Celeriac","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":50},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":2},{"unit":"tbsp","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"slice","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Pear 1","quantity":1}],"method":["Slice the mutton into thin strips and sauté in a pan until browned.","Chop the celeriac into small cubes and add it to the pan with the mutton.","Halve the cherry tomatoes and add them to the pan, cooking until they start to soften.","Finely chop the garlic and parsley, and sprinkle over the mutton and vegetables.","Toast a slice of wholegrain rye bread and serve alongside the mutton breakfast.","Finish with a sliced pear for a refreshing addition to the meal."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"sautéed mutton with celeriac, cherry tomatoes, garlic, parsley, served with toasted wholegrain rye bread and a side of sliced pear"}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Savory Veal & Garden Greens Platter","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Veal","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Boston Bibb Lettuce Butter Lettuce","quantity":45},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Mustard powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Begin by thinly slicing the veal and mincing one clove of garlic. Set the veal aside.","In a small bowl, mix a pinch of paprika sweet powder, parsley, cumin powder, mustard powder, and black pepper to create a dry rub.","Coat the veal slices in the dry rub mixture, ensuring both sides are evenly covered.","Heat a pan on medium-high and add a drizzle of cold-pressed olive oil. Once hot, add the rubbed veal and cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side or until browned and cooked through.","While the veal is cooking, wash and dry the rocket, iceberg lettuce, and Boston Bibb lettuce leaves. Toss them together in a large bowl to create a mixed greens salad base.","Toast a piece of wholegrain rye bread until it's crispy. Once cooled, cut into crouton-sized cubes and set aside.","Once the veal is done, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into strips if not done so already.","Arrange the mixed greens on a platter, top with the cooked veal strips, and sprinkle the toasted rye bread croutons over the dish.","Serve the Savory Veal & Garden Greens Platter promptly for a delicious and nourishing lunch."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A platter of mixed garden greens including rocket, iceberg lettuce, and butter lettuce, topped with slices of spiced and cooked veal, and scattered with crispy wholegrain rye bread croutons, with a light oil dressing."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Beluga Lentil Veggie Symphony","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Black Beluga Lentils","quantity":55},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Leek","quantity":25},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Garlic Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Strawberries 105 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Dill","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil forfrying","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Rinse the black beluga lentils and soak them for about 30 minutes before cooking.","Drain the lentils, add them to a pot with fresh water, and bring to a boil. Once boiling, reduce heat to simmer and cook for 20 minutes or until lentils are tender.","While the lentils cook, chop the broccoli and carrots into bite-sized pieces and finely slice the leek.","Heat the native coconut oil in a frying pan over medium heat, add the leek, and sauté until soft and translucent.","Add the garlic powder, turmeric, and paprika sweet powder to the leek and stir to combine.","Add the broccoli and carrots to the pan, season with salt and pepper, and stir-fry until the vegetables are crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.","Once the lentils are cooked, drain any excess water and mix them into the frying pan with the vegetables.","Finely chop the parsley and dill and sprinkle them over the mixture in the pan, stirring to distribute the herbs evenly.","Serve the Beluga Lentil Veggie Symphony hot, with a whole, fresh strawberry on the side for a sweet, fresh contrast."],"cookingTime":45,"imagePrompt":"A dish of black beluga lentils mixed with sautéed leek, broccoli, and carrots, seasoned with garlic powder, turmeric, paprika, garnished with fresh parsley and dill, served with a whole strawberry on the side."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Thanksgiving Flair Stir-Fry","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turkey Breast","quantity":135},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brussels Sprouts","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Cabbage","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asian greens","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Strawberries 105 g","quantity":105},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Finely chop the Brussels sprouts, red cabbage, and Asian greens.","Mince the garlic.","Slice the turkey breast into thin strips.","In a wok or large frying pan, heat the native coconut oil over medium heat.","Add the garlic to the pan and stir-fry until fragrant, about 1 minute.","Increase heat to high, add the turkey strips, and stir-fry until they start to brown, about 2-3 minutes.","Sprinkle the turkey with ginger powder, cinnamon, salt, and pepper, and continue to stir-fry for another minute.","Add the chopped vegetables to the pan and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes, until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.","Remove the pan from heat and stir in the fresh thyme.","Serve the stir-fry hot with sliced strawberries on the side for a sweet and savory balance."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A colorful dish of stir-fried turkey breast and an array of mixed vegetables including brussels sprouts, red cabbage, and Asian greens, seasoned with garlic and spices like ginger and cinnamon, served with fresh sliced strawberries on the side."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Desert Oasis Porridge","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Camel milk","quantity":200},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Porridge Oats","quantity":45},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Nutmeg Ground","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Strawberries 110 g","quantity":110}],"method":["In a small saucepan, heat the camel milk over medium heat until it begins to warm up.","Add in the porridge oats, stirring consistently, and let them cook for about 5 minutes or until they start to soften.","Reduce heat to low and continue to stir, adding a pinch of cinnamon, cardamom, and nutmeg ground to the mixture for flavor.","Cut the strawberries into small pieces, and then stir half of them into the oat mixture.","Allow the porridge to simmer for another 5 minutes, or until it reaches your desired consistency.","Remove from heat and let it sit for 1 minute to cool slightly.","Drizzle the porridge with flax seed oil before serving.","Top with the remaining strawberries for a fresh and fruity finish."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of creamy porridge made with camel milk and oats, topped with fresh strawberries and a drizzle of flax seed oil, seasoned with a pinch of cinnamon, cardamom, and nutmeg ground."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Mozzarella Veggie Rye Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Buffalo Mozzarella","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":65},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":2},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":2},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Peppercorn","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.","Thinly slice the broccoli and carrots, and place them on a baking tray.","Sprinkle the vegetables with rosemary, thyme, peppercorns, cayenne pepper, and a pinch of salt.","Drizzle the vegetables with native coconut oil and bake for 15 minutes or until tender.","Meanwhile, crush the garlic and spread it on the wholegrain rye bread slices.","Toast the bread in the oven for 5-7 minutes or until crispy.","Slice the buffalo mozzarella and set it aside.","Once the vegetables are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.","Place the toasted garlic rye bread on plates, top with roasted vegetables, and then the buffalo mozzarella slices.","Serve immediately while the mozzarella is still soft and the vegetables are warm."],"cookingTime":22,"imagePrompt":"Wholegrain rye bread slices topped with roasted broccoli and carrots, sprinkled with rosemary, thyme, peppercorns, and cayenne pepper, and covered with buffalo mozzarella slices served on a white plate."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Garden Delight Omelette","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"2 Eggs","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Frisee","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Radicchio","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Leafy Lettuce","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 155 g","quantity":155},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli Flakes","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegetables","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Curry Powder","quantity":1}],"method":["Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat them until well mixed.","Finely chop the garlic and add it to the eggs along with a pinch of salt, pepper, chilli flakes, coriander powder, cumin seeds, and curry powder.","Heat the ghee in a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour in the egg mixture. function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Aphrodite's Feta Fantasy","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Feta Cheese Sheep","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Bok Choy","quantity":45},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Apple 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Lemongrass","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat your oven to 190 degrees Celsius.","Chop the broccoli, carrots, and bok choy into bite-sized pieces.","Mince the garlic and crush the cumin seeds slightly.","Place the vegetables on a baking sheet, sprinkle with thyme, lemongrass, turmeric, chilli, and drizzle with ghee.","Roast in the oven for about 20 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.","While the vegetables roast, slice the apple thinly and crumble the feta cheese.","Once the vegetables are done, remove from oven, and top with sliced apple and crumbled feta cheese.","Serve with toasted wholegrain rye bread, brushed with a little cold-pressed olive oil."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"A colorful dish with roasted broccoli, carrots, bok choy topped with thinly sliced apple and crumbled feta cheese, served with a side of toasted wholegrain rye bread, seasoned with thyme, lemongrass, turmeric, and chilli."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Seeds and Saddles Breakfast","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pumpkin Seeds","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sunflower Seeds","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":90},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1}],"method":["Toast the pumpkin seeds and sunflower seeds in a dry pan over medium heat until fragrant and slightly golden.","Wash and chop the spinach then halve the cherry tomatoes.","Cut the cauliflower into small florets.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until golden and crispy.","Arrange the toasted rye bread on a plate.","In a frying pan, heat a pinch of cold-pressed olive oil over medium heat. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Soy Sprout Sensation","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Soy Sprouts","quantity":125},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":75},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Arugula Salad","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":40},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Garam Masala Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":5}],"method":["Wash the soy sprouts, iceberg lettuce, and arugula salad, and toss them together in a large bowl.","Toast the crispy rye bread until it's crispy and cut it into small pieces.","Sprinkle the cumin seeds over the salad.","Crush the garlic, and mix it with garam masala powder and flax seed oil to make a light dressing.","Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat everything evenly.","Top the salad with the crispy rye bread pieces just before serving for a delightful crunch."],"cookingTime":10,"imagePrompt":"A refreshing Soy Sprout Sensation salad with soy sprouts, iceberg lettuce, arugula, crispy rye bread, cumin seeds, and a light garlic dressing."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Mozzarella Morning Medley","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Buffalo Mozzarella","quantity":75},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus green","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Blueberries 105 g","quantity":105},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5}],"method":["Begin by slicing the buffalo mozzarella into thin pieces and set aside.","Wash the asparagus and red capsicum, then slice the capsicum into thin strips and trim the ends of the asparagus.","Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium heat with cold-pressed olive oil.","Saut the asparagus and red capsicum in the skillet until they are tender and slightly crisp, for about 3-4 minutes. function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Pork & Patchwork Veggie Toast","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pork Fillet","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Green Beans","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red leaf Red amaranth","quantity":15},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":30},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegetables","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mango 150 g","quantity":150}],"method":["Slice the pork fillet into thin strips and marinate with thyme and a pinch of salt.","Chop the cauliflower, green beans, red leaf amaranth, and cherry tomatoes into bite-sized pieces.","Heat the ghee in a pan over medium-high heat and add the pork strips, cooking them until they're browned and cooked through.","Remove the pork and set aside, keeping it warm.","In the same pan, add a bit more ghee if needed, and sauté the garlic until fragrant.","Add the chopped vegetables to the pan and stir-fry until they are tender but still crisp.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread to your liking.","Top the toasted rye bread with the cooked vegetables and then with the pork strips.","Drizzle with cold-pressed olive oil before serving.","Serve the pork and vegetable toast with fresh mango slices on the side."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Toast topped with sautéed cauliflower, green beans, red amaranth, cherry tomatoes, and browned pork fillet strips, drizzled with olive oil, served with slices of mango and a piece of wholegrain rye bread on a plate."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Garden Surprise Frittata","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"1 Eggs","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":55},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus green","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Zucchini","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":25},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 200C (400F).","Cut the broccoli, asparagus, zucchini, and carrots into small florets and slices.","Crush the garlic and finely chop the parsley.","In an ovenproof skillet, heat a dash of cold-pressed olive oil over medium heat.","Add the minced garlic to the skillet and saut until golden.","Add the broccoli, asparagus, zucchini, and carrots to the skillet and stir well.","Season the vegetables with salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, and thyme.","Saut the vegetables for about 5 minutes until they start to soften.","Make a well in the center of the vegetables and crack the egg into it.","Place the skillet in the oven and bake for 10 minutes, until the egg white is set but the yolk is still runny.","Remove from the oven and sprinkle with fresh parsley.","Serve the 'Garden Surprise Frittata' with a side of toasted wholegrain rye bread."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Garden Surprise Frittata with broccoli, asparagus, zucchini, carrots, garlic, parsley, cayenne pepper, thyme, salt, pepper, served on wholegrain rye bread"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Mutton Mirage Morning Feast","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mutton","quantity":100},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chanterellemushrooms","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":50},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Garlic Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mango 165 g","quantity":100},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1}],"method":["Cut the mutton into small cubes and season with ginger powder, garlic powder, rosemary, and cumin powder.","Heat a skillet over medium heat and add a pinch of cold-pressed olive oil.","Add the seasoned mutton cubes and sauté until they are browned on all sides.","Meanwhile, slice the chanterelle mushrooms and red capsicum, then add them to the skillet with the mutton.","Continue to cook until the vegetables are tender and the mutton is cooked through.","Remove from heat and let it rest for a couple of minutes.","Toast a piece of wholegrain rye bread to your preference.","Serve the mutton and vegetable sauté with the toasted rye bread on the side.","Complement the dish with fresh mango slices for a sweet and refreshing finish to the meal."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Breakfast plate with sautéed mutton cubes, chanterelle mushrooms, red capsicum, toasted wholegrain rye bread, and slices of fresh mango."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Mystic Shiitake Salad Symphony","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Shiitake mushrooms","quantity":155},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Leafy Lettuce","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curly Endive","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Dandelion Greens","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":15},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Curry Leaf","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curry Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1}],"method":["Clean the shiitake mushrooms and slice them.","Chop the leafy lettuce, curly endive, and dandelion greens, then combine them in a large salad bowl.","Grate the ginger and garlic.","Heat the native coconut oil in a pan over medium heat and add the curry leaves until they start to release their aroma.","Add the shiitake mushrooms to the pan along with the grated ginger, garlic, curry powder, paprika, coriander powder, cumin seeds, and a pinch of salt.","Saute the mushrooms until they are fully cooked and have absorbed the flavors, for about 7-8 minutes.","While the mushrooms cook, toast the wholegrain rye bread until it's crispy.","Once the mushrooms are cooked, mix them into the salad greens.","Garnish the salad with freshly chopped parsley.","Serve the salad with the crispy wholegrain rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A vibrant and colorful salad with shiitake mushrooms, leafy lettuce, curly endive, dandelion greens, garnished with fresh parsley, served with a side of toasted wholegrain rye bread on a plate."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Garden Delight with Cheesy Surprise","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Goat Cream Cheese Chèvre","quantity":80},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"White & brown mushrooms","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 140 g","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":20},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Oregano Leaf","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 200C (400F).","Chop the broccoli, carrots, and mushrooms into bite-sized pieces.","In a mixing bowl, toss the vegetables with olive oil, thyme, oregano, paprika powder, salt, and pepper.","Spread the vegetables in an even layer on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes, or until tender and slightly caramelized.","While the vegetables are roasting, slice the papaya and set aside.","Toast the rye bread until crispy and cut it into small cubes for a crunchy topping.","When the vegetables are done, let them cool slightly, then mix in the goat cream cheese gently until all pieces are coated.","Serve the roasted vegetable and goat cheese mixture topped with crispy rye bread cubes, with slices of fresh papaya on the side."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"A colorful dish featuring roasted broccoli, carrots, and mushrooms mixed with melted goat cream cheese, topped with crispy rye bread cubes, with slices of fresh papaya on the side."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Lamb's Garden Fiesta Salad","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lamb","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Boston Bibb Lettuce Butter Lettuce","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Romaine Lettuce","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curry Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lemongrass","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Peppercorn","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":20},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Strawberries 125 g","quantity":125},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":10}],"method":["Season the lamb with a blend of curry powder, minced garlic, ginger powder, and finely chopped lemongrass.","Heat ghee in a skillet over medium heat and cook the lamb until it reaches a desired level of doneness, approximately 4 to 6 minutes on each side for a medium-rare finish.","Combine the washed and chopped Boston Bibb lettuce, rocket, and romaine lettuce in a large salad bowl.","Slice the strawberries and add them to the salad mix.","Once the lamb is cooked, let it rest for a couple of minutes and then slice it thinly.","Add the lamb slices to the salad.","Drizzle cold-pressed olive oil over the salad, and season with a pinch of salt and freshly crushed peppercorns.","Toast the crispy rye bread slices until golden brown.","Serve the Lamb's Garden Fiesta Salad with the toasted crispy rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A colorful salad with sliced lamb, mixed lettuces including Boston bibb, rocket, romaine, strawberries, served with crispy rye bread on the side. function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Beluga Bounteous Bowl","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Black Beluga Lentils","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brussels Sprouts","quantity":75},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Dill","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Lemon 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1}],"method":["Rinse the black beluga lentils thoroughly and soak for 1 hour in water.","Drain the lentils and, in a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the lentils, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-25 minutes or until tender.","While the lentils are cooking, prepare the Brussels sprouts and red capsicum by cutting them into bite-sized pieces. Toss them with a little olive oil and a pinch of salt and roast in a preheated oven at 200C for 15 minutes or until caramelized and tender, stirring halfway through.","Fine-chop the parsley and dill for garnish.","Once lentils are cooked, drain any excess water and set aside to cool slightly.","Slice the garlic thinly and quick-pickle it in lemon juice squeezed from the lemon to add a refreshing tang to the dish.","In a large bowl, combine the cooked lentils, roasted Brussels sprouts, and red capsicum. Add in the pickled garlic and lemon juice.","Drizzle with cold-pressed olive oil, add a pinch of salt, and toss everything to combine.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until crispy.","Serve the Beluga Bounteous Bowl with a sprinkle of chopped parsley and dill, alongside a slice of crispy rye bread."],"cookingTime":45,"imagePrompt":"A bowl filled with black beluga lentils, roasted Brussels sprouts, red capsicum, garnished with chopped parsley and dill, with a slice of crispy rye bread on the side, and drizzled with olive oil."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Rise & Shine Smoked Hen Hash","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chicken Breast smoked","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Kale","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil forfrying","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Onion Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Hungarian Paprika","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Pear 1","quantity":1}],"method":["Chop the cauliflower, kale, carrots, and smoked chicken breast into small, bite-sized pieces.","Mince the garlic.","Heat the native coconut oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.","Add the minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 1 minute.","Add the cauliflower, kale, and carrots to the pan, and sprinkle with onion powder, Hungarian paprika, and cumin powder.","Cook for about 5 minutes, until the vegetables start to soften.","Add the smoked chicken breast to the pan and continue cooking for another 5 minutes until the chicken is heated through and the vegetables are tender.","While the hash is cooking, toast the wholegrain rye bread.","Slice the pear into thin wedges to serve on the side.","Serve the smoked hen hash hot with the toasted rye bread and fresh pear slices."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A colorful breakfast plate with smoked chicken breast hash mixed with chopped cauliflower, kale, and carrots, seasoned with onion powder, Hungarian paprika, and cumin, accompanied by toasted wholegrain rye bread and thin slices of pear."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Enchanted Evening Chicken Medley","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chicken Breast","quantity":140},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Zucchini","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 160 g","quantity":140},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Sage","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.","Slice the chicken breast into thin strips and place them on a baking sheet.","Cut the cauliflower and zucchini into bite-sized pieces and add them to the baking sheet with the chicken.","Drizzle the vegetables and chicken with cold-pressed olive oil.","Crush the garlic and sprinkle it over the chicken and vegetables along with basil, sage, salt, and pepper.","Bake in the oven for 20 minutes or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked and the vegetables are tender.","While the chicken and vegetables are cooking, peel and chop the papaya into small cubes.","Toast the piece of wholegrain rye bread until it's crispy.","Once the chicken and vegetables are done, remove them from the oven.","Serve the chicken and vegetables on a plate, with the toasted rye bread on the side and the fresh papaya cubes on top for a sweet and savory finish."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"Sliced chicken breast with roasted cauliflower and zucchini, topped with fresh papaya cubes and served with a side of crispy rye bread, seasoned with garlic, basil, and sage."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Exotic Chicken & Herb Infusion","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chicken Breast","quantity":130},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Boston Bibb Lettuce Butter Lettuce","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Dandelion Greens","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Coriander Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mustard Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Onion Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Oregano Leaf","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":5}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).","Combine ginger, garlic, turmeric, coriander seeds, thyme, and mustard seeds in a mortar and pestle, and grind to form a paste.","Rub the spice paste over the chicken breast and let it marinate for 15 minutes.","Place the marinated chicken breast on a baking tray and roast in the oven for 20 minutes or until fully cooked.","In a separate bowl, toss together the Boston bibb lettuce butter lettuce and dandelion greens.","Prepare a quick herb dressing by combining parsley, onion powder, cumin seeds, oregano leaf, and salt.","Drizzle the herb dressing over the salad greens and toss to coat evenly.","Remove the roasted chicken from the oven and slice it into strips.","Serve the herb-infused salad alongside the sliced chicken breast and a side of wholegrain rye bread."],"cookingTime":35,"imagePrompt":"A beautifully plated herb-infused salad with roasted chicken breast strips, accompanied by a side of wholegrain rye bread."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Protein-Packed Lentil Delight with Veggie Medley","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"YellowLentils","quantity":75},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Kale","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Raspberries 90 g","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":30}],"method":["Rinse the yellow lentils thoroughly and soak for 30 minutes.","Chop the kale, broccoli, and cauliflower into bite-sized pieces.","Finely mince the garlic.","Heat ghee in a pot over medium heat, add cumin seeds, and let them splutter.","Add the minced garlic to the pot and sauté until golden.","Drain the lentils and add to the pot with fresh water covering them by about an inch.","Bring to a boil and then reduce to a simmer, cooking until the lentils are tender (approx. 15-20 minutes).","In a separate pan, sauté the kale, broccoli, and cauliflower with coriander powder and pepper until they are slightly tender yet crisp.","Serve the lentils in a bowl topped with the sautéed vegetables.","Garnish with raspberries and serve with a slice of wholegrain rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":40,"imagePrompt":"A hearty bowl of yellow lentils topped with vibrant kale, broccoli, cauliflower, and a sprinkle of raspberries, paired with a slice of wholegrain rye bread."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sultan's Aromatic Turkey Salad","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turkey Breast","quantity":155},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Romaine Lettuce","quantity":55},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curly Endive","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curry Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic Powder","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chilli Flakes","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Lemongrass","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":30}],"method":["Pat the turkey breast dry, and season with a mixture of salt, curry powder, cumin powder, ginger powder, and garlic powder.","Heat ghee in a skillet over medium-high heat and sear the turkey breast for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.","Allow the turkey to rest for a few minutes and then slice into strips.","In a large salad bowl, combine the chopped romaine lettuce, rocket, and curly endive.","Prepare the dressing by whisking together cold-pressed olive oil for salads, paprika sweet powder, chilli flakes, and finely chopped lemongrass.","Toss the salad with the aromatic dressing, ensuring an even coating.","Top the dressed salad with the sliced turkey breast.","Serve the salad with pieces of crispy rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Sliced turkey breast atop a bed of romaine lettuce, rocket, and curly endive drizzled with an aromatic dressing made of olive oil, paprika, chilli flakes, and lemongrass, served with crispy rye bread on the side."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Savory Veggie and Egg Medley","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"1 Eggs","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Zucchini","quantity":120},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":20}],"method":["Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and add cold-pressed olive oil.","Once the oil is hot, add cherry tomatoes and zucchini to the pan, sautéing until they begin to soften, about 4-5 minutes.","In a small bowl, beat the egg with a pinch of salt and pepper.","Pour the beaten egg over the sautéed vegetables in the skillet, covering them evenly.","Cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the egg is set around the edges.","Using a spatula, gently lift the edges of the omelette to allow any uncooked egg to flow underneath.","Once the omelette is mostly set but still slightly runny on top, fold it in half and cook for another 2-3 minutes until the egg is fully cooked through.","Meanwhile, toast the wholegrain rye bread until golden and crispy.","Serve the omelette with the toasted rye bread on the side, garnished with a pinch of basil."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A fluffy omelette filled with cherry tomatoes and zucchini, served with a slice of toasted wholegrain rye bread and a sprinkle of fresh basil."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Seed Sizzle","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pumpkin Seeds","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sunflower Seeds","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus green","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":25},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Powder","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat your oven to 180 degrees Celsius.","On a baking sheet, spread out the pumpkin seeds and sunflower seeds. Place in the oven and roast for about 10 minutes, until they are golden brown and fragrant.","Meanwhile, prepare the vegetables: cut the asparagus into 1-inch pieces, chop the broccoli into small florets, and halve the cherry tomatoes.","After the seeds are toasted, remove them from the oven and let them cool.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until it is crispy and golden brown.","In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, a pinch of basil, cumin powder, and paprika to make a simple dressing.","Arrange the toasted rye bread on a plate. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Shepherd's Dawn Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Feta Cheese Sheep","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":40},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli Flakes","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil forfrying","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Nectarine1","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Black olives","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1}],"method":["Chop the cauliflower into small florets and slice the garlic finely.","Heat the native coconut oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.","Add the garlic and chilli flakes to the pan and sauté until the garlic is golden.","Toss in the cauliflower florets and cook until they begin to soften.","Add the spinach leaves and cook until wilted.","Crumble the feta cheese over the vegetable mixture and stir gently until the feta is slightly melted and evenly distributed.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until crispy.","Serve the vegetable and feta mix on top of the toasted rye bread.","Garnish with black olives and fresh parsley leaves.","Serve the nectarine sliced on the side as a sweet and juicy contrast to the savory toast."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"Toasted rye bread topped with sautéed spinach, cauliflower, crumbled feta cheese, black olives, and parsley, with a side of sliced nectarine."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Squid Symphony with Veggie Overture","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Squid","quantity":155},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":100},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Silverbeet","quantity":55}],"method":["Begin by cleaning the squid and cutting it into rings or small pieces, as preferred.","Dice the cauliflower into small florets, slice the silverbeet, mince the garlic, chop the onion, and halve the cherry tomatoes.","In a pan, heat the ghee over medium heat and sauté the onion and garlic until translucent.","Increase the heat to medium-high and add the squid to the pan, cooking until it becomes opaque, which should take around 2 minutes.","Add the cauliflower, silverbeet, and cherry tomatoes to the pan, season with salt and pepper, and stir-fry for another 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.","Meanwhile, toast the wholegrain rye bread to your desired level.","Once the vegetables and squid are cooked, drizzle cold-pressed olive oil over them and garnish with freshly chopped parsley.","Serve the stir-fried squid and vegetables alongside the toasted rye bread, with a wedge of lemon on the side to squeeze over the dish."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A dish with stir-fried squid rings, cauliflower florets, sliced silverbeet, halved cherry tomatoes, garnished with parsley, served with a toasted piece of wholegrain rye bread and a wedge of lemon on the side."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Mango Yogurt Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Whole Milk Natural Yogurt plain 3.8% fat","quantity":205},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mango 155 g","quantity":155},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":2},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Raisins","quantity":15},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5}],"method":["Peel and cube the mango into small bite-sized pieces.","Finely grate the ginger.","In a bowl, mix the whole milk natural yogurt with cinnamon, cardamom, and grated ginger until well combined.","In serving glasses, lay down half the spiced yogurt as the first layer.","Add half of the cubed mango as the next layer on top of the yogurt.","Sprinkle half of the raisins on top of the mango layer.","Repeat the layers with the remaining yogurt, mango, and raisins.","Garnish with a sprig of fresh parsley.","Serve immediately or refrigerate for 30 minutes to cool and let the flavors develop."],"cookingTime":10,"imagePrompt":"A delightful breakfast parfait with spiced whole milk natural yogurt, fresh mango cubes, and sprinkled raisins, all topped with a sprig of fresh parsley in a clear serving glass."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Seed Symphony","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pumpkin Seeds","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sunflower Seeds","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Savoy Cabbage","quantity":50}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 180C.","Finely chop the red capsicum and savoy cabbage.","In a baking tray, spread out the pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, red capsicum, and savoy cabbage.","Bake for 10 minutes, or until the seeds are lightly toasted and the vegetables are tender.","Remove from the oven and let it cool.","Place the toasted mixture in a bowl.","Drizzle with cold-pressed olive oil for salads, and toss gently to combine.","Serve in a beautiful dish and enjoy the Sunrise Seed Symphony."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A colorful mix of toasted pumpkin and sunflower seeds, with red capsicum and savoy cabbage, drizzled with olive oil, in a vibrant morning setting."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Symphony in Pork","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pork Fillet","quantity":100},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Celeriac","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 175 g","quantity":175},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5}],"method":["Season the pork fillet with a pinch of salt, thyme, parsley, crushed garlic, and chilli powder.","Heat ghee in a skillet over medium-high heat and sear the pork fillet on all sides until golden brown.","Lower the heat, cover the skillet, and cook the pork until it reaches an internal temperature of 145 degrees Fahrenheit (approximately 10-15 minutes).","Meanwhile, peel and dice the celeriac, and sauté it in the same skillet alongside the pork for about 5 minutes, until it's slightly softened.","Add the spinach to the skillet and sauté until wilted (about 2 minutes).","Remove the skillet from heat and let the pork rest for a few minutes before slicing it thinly.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread.","Arrange the sliced pork, sautéed vegetables, and toast on a plate.","Drizzle the sautéed vegetables with cold-pressed olive oil.","Serve the papaya on the side to complete the dish."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"Sliced pork fillet with sautéed celeriac and spinach, a side of toasted wholegrain rye bread, and fresh papaya slices beautifully arranged on a plate"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Shepherd's Scramble","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mutton","quantity":100},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Strawberries 125 g","quantity":125},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mustard Seeds","quantity":5}],"method":["Finely chop the garlic and red capsicum.","Cut the mutton into small cubes.","Heat olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat.","Add the mustard seeds to the oil and let them splutter.","Add the garlic and red capsicum to the pan and sauté until soft.","Add the mutton pieces to the pan and cook until brown on all sides.","Reduce the heat, sprinkle in the cayenne pepper and thyme, then continue to cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.","Wash the spinach and add it to the pan, allowing it to wilt with the mutton.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread in a toaster or a dry pan.","Serve the mutton scramble on the toasted rye bread.","On the side, serve fresh strawberries for a sweet and refreshing finish."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Mutton cubes cooked with red capsicum, wilted spinach, and spices on top of toasted wholegrain rye bread, accompanied by fresh strawberries on the side."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Mystical Sprouts Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Soy Sprouts","quantity":125},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Arugula Salad","quantity":135},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":60},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":20},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Wash the Arugula Salad and Soy Sprouts thoroughly in cold water and let them drain.","Cut the Wholegrain Rye Bread into small cubes to make croutons.","In a pan, heat a teaspoon of Flax Seed Oil and toast the rye croutons until they are crispy, then set aside to cool.","Crush the garlic and cumin seeds together in a mortar and pestle until they form a rough paste.","In a large mixing bowl, combine the garlic and cumin paste with a pinch of salt, a pinch of pepper, and the remaining Flax Seed Oil to create a dressing.","Add the Arugula Salad and Soy Sprouts to the mixing bowl and toss them gently with the dressing to coat evenly.","Sprinkle a pinch of Cayenne Pepper over the salad for an extra kick.","Serve the salad on plates and top with the crispy rye croutons."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A vibrant salad composed of Arugula Salad and Soy Sprouts, garnished with golden-brown Wholegrain Rye Bread croutons and sprinkled with a pinch of Cayenne Pepper, all on an elegant white plate."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Perch Pirouette on Kohlrabi Carpaccio","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Perch","quantity":135},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Kohlrabi","quantity":135},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mango145 g","quantity":145},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":15},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Lemongrass","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10}],"method":["Peel and thinly slice the kohlrabi to create a carpaccio base and arrange it onto the plates.","Season the perch with salt, coriander powder, cumin powder, cayenne pepper, and a hint of grated garlic and ginger.","Heat ghee in a skillet on medium heat and sauté the perch until it is golden and cooked through, approximately 4-5 minutes per side.","In the meantime, toast the crispy rye bread and then cut it into small croutons for added texture.","Peel and dice the mango into small cubes, mix with minced parsley and a pinch of lemongrass for a fresh salsa.","Once the perch is cooked, let it rest for a minute and then place it on top of the kohlrabi carpaccio.","Scatter the mango salsa over the fish and sprinkle with the rye croutons.","Drizzle the dish with cold-pressed olive oil and garnish with a few parsley leaves."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Perch fillets cooked and served on thinly sliced kohlrabi with mango salsa, rye bread croutons, garnished with parsley leaves, drizzled with olive oil, seasoned with coriander, cumin, cayenne pepper, garlic, and ginger"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Divine Garden Honour","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Goat Cream Cheese Chèvre","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":80},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Currants 90 g","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":40},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mustard powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5}],"method":["Grate the cauliflower and carrots, mince the garlic, and finely chop the red currants.","In a mixing bowl, combine the goat cream cheese chèvre with the grated cauliflower, carrots, red currants, minced garlic, and a pinch of turmeric to create a bright, flavorful spread.","Season the spread with coriander powder, mustard powder, and finely grated ginger for a hint of spice and warmth.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until it reaches a desired crispness.","Spread the goat cream cheese and vegetable mixture evenly on the toasted rye bread slices.","Drizzle a light amount of cold-pressed olive oil over the topped rye bread for added richness."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"Aper of vibrant wholegrain rye bread slices loaded with slabs of goat cream cheese and a colorful vegetable medley blend, adorned by drizzles of golden olive oil."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Rustic Duck Festivity Salad","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Duck Breast","quantity":125},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Bay Leaf","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Star Anise","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Boston Bibb Lettuce Butter Lettuce","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Radicchio","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Oak Leaf Lettuce","quantity":50},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Peach 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1}],"method":["Begin by patting the duck breast dry with paper towels. Score the skin in a crosshatch pattern.","Season the duck breast with salt, pepper, and a pinch of paprika sweet powder. Sear in a hot pan skin-side down for 6-7 minutes, until the skin is golden and crispy.","Turn the duck breast over, add bay leaf, star anise, and garlic to the pan, and cook for another 4-5 minutes for medium rare. Let rest before slicing.","Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine Boston Bibb lettuce, radicchio, and red oak leaf lettuce to create a mixed salad base.","Whisk together cold-pressed olive oil, crushed garlic, thyme, and basil to create a simple dressing for the salad.","Cut the peach into thin slices and set aside.","Toast a slice of wholegrain rye bread and cut it into bite-sized croutons.","Assemble the salad by tossing the greens with the dressing, then top with sliced duck, peach pieces, and rye croutons.","Serve immediately with an extra pinch of fresh herbs for garnish."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A plate of Rustic Duck Festivity Salad topped with sliced duck breast, mixed greens including Boston Bibb lettuce, radicchio, red oak leaf lettuce, peach slices, and rye bread croutons, all dressed in a simple herb and cold-pressed olive oil dressing, garnished with a leaf of basil and sprigs of thyme."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Rye Yogurt Bowl","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Whole Milk Natural Yogurt plain 3.8% fat","quantity":195},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Honey","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Walnuts","quantity":15}],"method":["Start by toasting the slice of crispy rye bread until it is golden brown and crunchy.","While the bread is toasting, mix the whole milk natural yogurt with a pinch of cinnamon until well combined.","Once the rye bread is toasted, let it cool slightly and then crumble it into bite-sized pieces.","On a serving bowl, layer the flavored yogurt as the base.","Sprinkle the crumbled rye bread over the yogurt.","Garnish with fresh parsley and a drizzle of honey.","Lastly, add crushed walnuts for a crunchy texture."],"cookingTime":5,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of whole milk natural yogurt mixed with cinnamon, topped with crumbled crispy rye bread, fresh parsley, a drizzle of honey, and crushed walnuts."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Rustic Veal & Verdure Harmony","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Veal","quantity":130},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Green Beans","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":65},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":15},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Apple 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Begin by preheating your oven to 180C (360F).","Clean and chop the green beans and broccoli into bite-sized pieces.","In a bowl, toss the vegetables with paprika powder, cayenne pepper, minced garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper.","Spread the seasoned vegetables on a baking tray and roast in the oven for approximately 20 minutes, or until they begin to brown and are tender.","While the vegetables are roasting, heat the ghee in a pan over medium heat.","Season the veal with salt and pepper, and sear it in the pan for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until browned and cooked to your liking.","As the veal rests, slice the wholegrain rye bread and toast it lightly.","For a refreshing side, core and slice the apple into thin wedges.","Plate the veal alongside the roasted vegetables, with the toasted rye bread and apple slices on the side as a palate cleanser and to add freshness to the meal."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"A plate with slices of seared veal, roasted green beans and broccoli, toasted wholegrain rye bread, and apple wedges, seasoned with paprika and cayenne pepper"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Lentil Melange à la Verdure","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Black Beluga Lentils","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Leek","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":85},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"tbsp","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1},{"unit":"slice","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Rinse the black beluga lentils and soak for 1-2 hours before cooking.","Thinly slice the leek and cherry tomatoes; mince the garlic.","In a pot, combine the lentils and 2 cups of water, then bring to a boil. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Goat Mirage en Pumpkin Oasis","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Goat","quantity":135},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pumpkin","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 155 g","quantity":135}],"method":["Dice the pumpkin into small cubes and chop the spinach finely.","Season the goat with salt, sweet paprika powder, cumin powder, and a hint of cinnamon.","Heat the coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat and add minced garlic. function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Oceanic Cauliflower Sizzle","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brisling Sardines","quantity":115},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":50},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Celery Seed","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Peppercorn","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil forfrying","quantity":1}],"method":["Rinse the cauliflower florets and spinach, and then chop both into bite-sized pieces.","Crush and finely mince the garlic.","In a pan, heat the native coconut oil over medium heat and add the brisling sardines, cooking until heated through and just starting to crisp.","In the same pan, add the cauliflower florets and cook until they're golden and slightly tender, stirring frequently.","Add the minced garlic, pinch of celery seed, salt, and some peppercorns to the pan, and stir well until fragrant, about 1 minute.","Toss the fresh spinach into the pan until just wilted.","Serve the sizzling cauliflower and spinach alongside the brisling sardines, with a slice of crispy rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"A sizzling pan of cauliflower and spinach with cooked brisling sardines, flavored with garlic, celery seed, and peppercorns, served with a slice of crispy rye bread."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Spice Symphony Porridge","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Buffalo Milk","quantity":175},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Oatmeal","quantity":30},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Fennel Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Apricot fresh 120 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":5}],"method":["In a small pot, bring the buffalo milk to a gentle boil.","Stir in the oatmeal and reduce the heat to a simmer.","Add a pinch of fennel powder, cinnamon, ginger powder, and crushed cardamom pods into the pot.","Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring frequently, until the oatmeal absorbs the milk and becomes creamy.","Meanwhile, dice the fresh apricot into small pieces.","Once the porridge is cooked, remove from heat and stir in the diced apricot.","To serve, drizzle flax seed oil over the porridge for a nutty flavor and sprinkle coriander powder for an aromatic finish."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"Creamy oatmeal porridge in a bowl made with buffalo milk, spiced with fennel powder, cinnamon, ginger powder, cardamom, with diced fresh apricot on top, drizzled with flax seed oil and sprinkled with coriander powder."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Protein-packed Lentil Bowl","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Lentils","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brussels Sprouts","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pumpkin","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":50},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Blueberries 105 g","quantity":105}],"method":["Rinse the red lentils and cook according to package instructions until tender.","While the lentils are cooking, wash and steam the Brussels sprouts, pumpkin, and cherry tomatoes until tender.","Crush the garlic and set aside.","Slice the wholegrain rye bread and toast until crispy.","Once the lentils and vegetables are cooked, assemble the bowl by placing the steamed vegetables and lentils into the bowl.","Garnish with crushed garlic, a pinch of salt, and fresh blueberries.","Serve with a side of crispy wholegrain rye bread."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"A bowl filled with steamed brussels sprouts, pumpkin, cherry tomatoes, red lentils, and blueberries, alongside a slice of crispy wholegrain rye bread."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Seedy Sunrise Symphony","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pumpkin Seeds","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sunflower Seeds","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Radish","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brussels Sprouts","quantity":30},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Strawberries 110 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli Flakes","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil forfrying","quantity":5}],"method":["Wash the spinach leaves, radishes, and Brussels sprouts thoroughly.","Slice the radishes into thin discs and chop the Brussels sprouts into halves.","Heat the native coconut oil in a skillet over medium heat.","Once hot, add the pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, and a pinch of chilli flakes to the skillet and toast them until they start to pop, about 2 minutes.","Add sliced radishes and halved Brussels sprouts into the skillet and sauté for another 2 minutes.","Stir in the spinach and season the mixture with a pinch of cinnamon, ginger powder, and sauté until the spinach wilts, approximately 2 to 3 minutes.","Transfer the cooked seeds and vegetables to a serving plate.","Garnish with fresh strawberries on the side for a burst of sweetness.","Serve as a warm and nutritious breakfast bowl."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"Seedy Sunrise Symphony breakfast bowl with toasted pumpkin seeds and sunflower seeds, sautéed spinach, thinly sliced radishes, halved Brussels sprouts, and fresh strawberries on the side"}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Beluga Lentil Veggie Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Black Beluga Lentils","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Green Cabbage","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red capsicum","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Avocado","quantity":35},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Coriander Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Mustard Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":10}],"method":["Rinse the black beluga lentils thoroughly, then cook in 120 ml of water with a pinch of salt for about 25 minutes until tender.","While the lentils are cooking, finely slice the green cabbage, dice the red capsicum, and cube the avocado.","Mince the garlic and lightly toast along with cumin seeds, coriander seeds, and mustard seeds in a pan over medium heat until fragrant.","In a mixing bowl, combine the cooked lentils with the cabbage, capsicum, avocado, and toasted spices.","Season the salad with fresh lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and freshly ground pepper to taste.","Finely chop the parsley and sprinkle over the salad.","Serve the salad with a piece of crispy rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"A vibrant bowl of cooked black beluga lentils mixed with finely sliced green cabbage, diced red capsicum, and cubed avocado, garnished with fresh parsley, accompanied by a piece of crispy rye bread with toasted cumin, coriander, mustard seeds and a drizzle of olive oil."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Mystical Mushroom Salad Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Shiitake mushrooms","quantity":135},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Radicchio","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Oak Leaf Lettuce","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Strawberries 105 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5}],"method":["Clean the shiitake mushrooms thoroughly, slice them thinly, and set aside.","Wash the radicchio and red oak leaf lettuce, then tear them into bite-sized pieces.","In a pan, heat the native coconut oil over medium heat.","Add the sliced shiitake mushrooms to the pan and sauté until browned and tender.","Slice the strawberries and chop the parsley.","Arrange the radicchio and red oak leaf lettuce on a serving platter.","Top the greens with the sautéed shiitake mushrooms.","Garnish with sliced strawberries and chopped parsley.","Serve immediately as a refreshing mushroom salad.","Enjoy the delightful blend of flavors and textures!"],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A serving platter with a refreshing mushroom salad featuring sautéed shiitake mushrooms, mixed with torn radicchio and red oak leaf lettuce, garnished with sliced strawberries and chopped parsley."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Surprise Morning Meat & Veg Mingle","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Veal","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Savoy Cabbage","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 160 g","quantity":80},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Caraway Seed","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Hungarian Paprika","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Peppercorn","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Fennel Seeds","quantity":1}],"method":["Thinly slice the veal and lightly season with paprika, caraway seeds, crushed peppercorns, and fennel seeds.","Chop the savoy cabbage into fine shreds.","Peel and dice the papaya into small cubes.","Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, add minced garlic, and sauté until fragrant.","Add the seasoned veal to the skillet and cook until browned, about 3-5 minutes, then set aside.","In the same skillet, add the savoy cabbage and sauté until it wilts, about 3-4 minutes.","Toast the crispy rye bread to preferred crunchiness.","Serve the veal and savoy cabbage hot with the toasted rye bread on the side and top the dish with fresh papaya cubes."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Sliced veal seasoned with paprika, caraway seeds, peppercorns, and fennel seeds, sautéed savoy cabbage, diced papaya, toasted rye bread drizzled with olive oil and minced garlic"}
