function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Crimson Sunset Frittata","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"1 Eggs","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Savoy Cabbage","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Leek","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":45},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":50}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.","Chop the savoy cabbage, leek, and red capsicum into small pieces.","In a non-stick skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sauté the chopped vegetables until they're slightly softened, about 5 minutes.","In a bowl, beat the egg and season it with salt, pepper, and a pinch of cumin powder.","Spread the sautéed vegetables evenly in the skillet, and then pour the beaten egg mixture over them, making sure the egg covers all the veggies.","Cook on the stove for another 2 minutes until the edges begin to set.","Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the frittata is set and lightly golden on top.","Meanwhile, toast the rye bread to your liking.","Serve the frittata hot with the toasted rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"A frittata cut into wedges, filled with savoy cabbage, leek, red capsicum, spinach, cherry tomatoes, seasoned with cumin, alongside a toasted slice of wholegrain rye bread, set on a rustic table in the glow of sunset lighting."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Lentil Symphony with Veggie Orchestra","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Black Beluga Lentils","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Zucchini","quantity":55},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus green","quantity":45},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Bay Leaf","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Strawberries 125 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10}],"method":["Rinse the black beluga lentils thoroughly under running water and then combine with 2 cups of water, bay leaf, and a pinch of salt in a medium saucepan.","Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 25-30 minutes, or until lentils are tender.","While the lentils are cooking, dice the zucchini, red capsicum, and trim the asparagus into bite-size pieces.","Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Spice Mango Porridge","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Milk","quantity":190},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Porridge Oats","quantity":40},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Mango 140 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":2}],"method":["In a small pot, bring the milk to a gentle simmer.","Crush the cardamom pods and add them to the simmering milk along with a pinch of cinnamon and ginger powder.","Gradually stir in the porridge oats, reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes or until the oats are soft and creamy.","While the oats are cooking, peel and dice the mango.","Once the porridge is done, remove from the heat and let it sit for a couple of minutes.","Optional: Drizzle a little honey over the prepared porridge for added sweetness and flavor.","Serve the porridge in a bowl and top with fresh diced mango."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of creamy porridge oats topped with fresh diced mango, sprinkled with cinnamon and cardamom."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Harmony Omelette Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"1 Eggs","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chanterelle mushrooms","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chicory Belgium Endive","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Green Cabbage","quantity":30},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cantaloupe 90 g","quantity":90},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1}],"method":["Wash the spinach, chicory Belgium Endive, green cabbage, and chanterelle mushrooms thoroughly and chop them into small pieces.","In a non-stick skillet, sauté the vegetables until they are soft, seasoning them with salt, pepper, paprika sweet powder, and thyme.","In a bowl, beat the egg and then pour it over the sautéed vegetables in the skillet.","Cook the omelette until it sets, then fold it in half and slide it onto a plate.","Arrange the cantaloupe slices and a piece of crispy rye bread on the plate alongside the omelette.","Serve the omelette hot, accompanied by the cantaloupe slices and crispy rye bread."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A plate with a colorful omelette made with spinach, chanterelle mushrooms, chicory Belgium Endive, green cabbage, seasoned with salt, pepper, paprika sweet powder, and thyme, served with thin slices of cantaloupe and a piece of crispy rye bread."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Jumbo Prawn Fiesta","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Jumbo Prawns","quantity":155},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":55},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"BokChoy","quantity":50},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Peppercorn","quantity":1}],"method":["Start by cleaning the prawns and pat them dry with a paper towel.","Chop the cauliflower into florets, halve the cherry tomatoes, and slice the bok choy.","Mince the garlic and set aside.","Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).","In a large baking dish, toss the cauliflower florets and cherry tomatoes with olive oil, minced garlic, turmeric, salt, and a pinch of peppercorn.","Place the prawns on top of the cauliflower and tomato mixture.","Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the prawns are pink and opaque.","While the dish is baking, toast the piece of crispy rye bread until golden and crisp.","Remove the prawn and vegetable fiesta from the oven and sprinkle with chopped parsley.","Serve the Jumbo Prawn Fiesta hot, accompanied by the crispy rye bread.","Enjoy the flavorful combination of prawns and vegetables in this festive dish!"],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A delicious baked dish with jumbo prawns, cauliflower florets, halved cherry tomatoes, and sliced bok choy, garnished with parsley, served with a side of crispy rye bread, all on a rustic ceramic platter."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Feta Fantasia Veg Melange","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Feta Cheese Sheep","quantity":95},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus white","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Green Beans","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":40},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":1}],"method":["Wash and peel the carrots, then slice into thin rounds.","Trim the white asparagus and cut into 2-inch pieces.","Top and tail the green beans and chop them into bite-sized lengths.","Cut the broccoli into small florets.","Heat a skillet over medium heat with a pinch of native coconut oil.","Add the prepared carrots, asparagus, green beans, and broccoli to the skillet.","Season the vegetables with a pinch each of cumin powder, parsley, pepper, and salt.","Saut the vegetables for 5-7 minutes or until they are tender and fragrant.","While the vegetables are cooking, toast the wholegrain rye bread to your liking.","Crumble the feta cheese into a small bowl.","Once the vegetables are done, plate them, and top with the crumbled feta cheese.","Garnish with additional parsley if desired and serve immediately with the toasted rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A colorful melange of sauted vegetables including carrots, asparagus, green beans, and broccoli, topped with crumbling feta cheese, served with a slice of toasted wholegrain rye bread on a white ceramic plate garnished with parsley."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Chicken Herb Garden Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chicken Breast","quantity":155},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Boston Bibb Lettuce Butter Lettuce","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curly Endive","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":50},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley Leaf Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Fennel Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat the grill to medium heat.","Season the chicken breast with basil, parsley leaf powder, fennel seeds, salt, and pepper.","Grill the chicken breast for about 6-8 minutes on each side until fully cooked, with nice grill marks on the outside.","While the chicken is grilling, tear the Boston Bibb lettuce, iceberg lettuce, rocket, and curly endive and place them in a large bowl.","Prepare a simple vinaigrette by whisking together cold-pressed olive oil, a pinch of salt, and a pinch of pepper.","Once the chicken is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes, then slice it into strips.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until golden and crispy.","Toss the greens with the vinaigrette and divide them between the serving plates.","Arrange the grilled chicken strips on top of the salads.","Serve the herb garden chicken with a side of toasted wholegrain rye bread.","Enjoy this delightful and flavorful dish!"],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A plate with grilled herb-infused chicken breast strips on a bed of fresh mixed greens, served with toasted wholegrain rye bread, and a light vinaigrette dressing."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Aromatic Yogurt Zen","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sheep Yogurt","quantity":180},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Strawberries 90 g","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Nutmeg Ground","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5}],"method":["Hull the strawberries and slice them into halves.","In a small bowl, grate 5g of fresh ginger and set aside.","Take a pinch each of cinnamon, ground cardamom, ground nutmeg, and dried parsley, and mix these spices in a separate bowl.","In a serving bowl, combine 180g of sheep yogurt with the grated ginger and the spice mixture, stirring until well incorporated.","Gently fold the strawberry halves into the spiced yogurt, reserving some for garnish.","Chill the Aromatic Yogurt Zen in the fridge for about 5 minutes before serving.","Garnish with the remaining strawberry halves for a visually appealing breakfast delight."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of sheep yogurt mixed with strawberries and garnished with cinnamon, cardamom, nutmeg, and dried parsley, with fresh ginger on the side."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sardine Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sardines","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"BokChoy","quantity":145},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Pear 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":30}],"method":["Rinse the sardines and pat them dry with a paper towel.","Chop the bok choy into bite-sized pieces and wash thoroughly to remove any grit or dirt.","Slice the pear into thin wedges, removing the core and seeds.","Toast the crispy rye bread until golden and crisp, then break it into crouton-sized pieces.","In a large bowl, combine the bok choy, pear slices, and sardines.","Drizzle with a simple vinaigrette of olive oil, a splash of vinegar, salt, and a pinch of black pepper.","Gently toss the salad to coat everything evenly.","Divide the salad into serving bowls, sprinkle with the crispy rye bread croutons, and serve immediately."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"Sardine Delight with Bok Choy, Pear, and Crispy Rye Bread Croutons"}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Almond Crunch Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Almonds","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sunflower Seeds","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Butternut Squash","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Artichokes canned or frozen","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Watermelon 170 g","quantity":170},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli Flakes","quantity":1}],"method":["Chop the butternut squash, broccoli, and artichokes into small, bite-sized pieces.","Heat the native coconut oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat.","Add the butternut squash to the pan and sauté for 3 minutes.","Add the broccoli and artichokes to the pan, sprinkle with a pinch of cinnamon, and continue sautéing for another 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.","Meanwhile, in a dry pan, lightly toast the almonds and sunflower seeds over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, or until they become fragrant and slightly golden.","Remove the toasted nuts and seeds from the heat and let them cool.","Once the vegetables are done, transfer them to a serving bowl.","Top the sautéed vegetables with the toasted almonds and sunflower seeds.","Garnish with a pinch of parsley and chilli flakes for added flavor.","Serve with fresh watermelon slices on the side."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of sautéed butternut squash, broccoli, and artichokes topped with toasted almonds and sunflower seeds, garnished with parsley and chilli flakes, served with slices of fresh watermelon on the side."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Herbaceous Mackerel Symphony","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mackerel","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brussels Sprouts","quantity":145},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Mango 165 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Oregano Leaf","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Coriander Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":50}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 200C (390F).","Grate the ginger and set aside.","Clean and halve the brussels sprouts, toss them with olive oil, oregano, cayenne pepper, and a pinch of salt.","Place the brussels sprouts onto a baking sheet and roast in the oven for about 20 minutes or until golden and tender.","While the sprouts are roasting, dry toast the coriander seeds in a small pan until fragrant, then crush them slightly using a mortar and pestle.","Slice and pit the mango, then cut the flesh into long strips.","Season the mackerel with the crushed coriander seeds, grated ginger, and a pinch of salt.","Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and cook the mackerel for about 4 minutes per side, or until cooked through.","Slice the wholegrain rye bread and toast it lightly.","Plate the mackerel with a side of roasted brussels sprouts and sliced mango, accompanied by the toasted rye bread."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"A plate of herb-crusted mackerel topped with grated ginger, accompanied by roasted oregano and cayenne spiced brussels sprouts, fresh mango slices, and a slice of toasted wholegrain rye bread."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Mysterious Mutton Masquerade","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mutton","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus white","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mustard powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garam Masala Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1}],"method":["Pat the mutton dry with paper towels and season with a pinch of salt.","In a pan, heat the native coconut oil over medium heat and add cumin seeds until they begin to crackle.","Add the finely chopped garlic and ginger to the pan and sauté until fragrant.","Place the mutton in the pan and sear each side for 3-4 minutes until browned.","Sprinkle the mustard powder, cayenne pepper, turmeric, garam masala powder, and a pinch of rosemary over the mutton. Stir to coat the meat evenly with spices.","Reduce the heat, cover the pan, and let the mutton cook for 10 minutes.","While the mutton is cooking, wash the white asparagus and snap off the woody ends.","In a separate pan, heat a small amount of coconut oil and add the asparagus. Cook for about 5 minutes until it becomes tender but still retains a bit of crunch.","Arrange the cooked asparagus as a bed on a plate and place the mutton on top, allowing some of the cooking juices to drizzle over.","Serve the Mysterious Mutton Masquerade hot with a slice of wholegrain rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"A plate with spicy mutton laying on a bed of cooked white asparagus, seasoned with cumin seeds, garlic, ginger, rosemary, mustard powder, cayenne pepper, turmeric, and garam masala, served with a slice of wholegrain rye bread and a sprig of rosemary on top, all fried in native coconut oil."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Pumpkin Power Lunch Bowl","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Lentils","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pumpkin","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":30},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Avocado","quantity":50}],"method":["Rinse the red lentils thoroughly and boil them in water with half a pinch of salt until they are soft, about 15-20 minutes.","While the lentils are cooking, steam the pumpkin until it is tender, about 10-15 minutes.","Slice the cherry tomatoes in half, and cut the avocado into cubes.","Drain the cooked lentils and combine them with the steamed pumpkin in a large serving bowl.","Add the sliced cherry tomatoes and avocado cubes on top of the lentil and pumpkin mix.","Chop the basil and sprinkle it over the salad for a fresh flavor.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread to your preferred level of crispiness and serve on the side of the bowl.","For an added kick, feel free to sprinkle a little extra paprika powder and cumin powder over the whole bowl before serving."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"A colorful lunch bowl filled with tender red lentils, steamed pumpkin, cherry tomatoes, and avocado cubes, sprinkled with chopped basil and served with a slice of toasted wholegrain rye bread."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Lamb Zen Garden Salad","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lamb","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Boston Bibb Lettuce Butter Lettuce","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Romaine Lettuce","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mustard Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Pear 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lemongrass","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":5}],"method":["Rub the lamb with cumin seeds, coriander powder, mustard seeds, minced garlic, finely chopped lemongrass, a pinch of salt and pepper, and cayenne pepper.","Let the lamb marinate for at least 30 minutes.","Heat ghee in a pan over medium heat and cook the lamb until it reaches your desired doneness, then let it rest.","While the lamb rests, toast the wholegrain rye bread until crispy.","Mix the various lettuces and rocket in a bowl, drizzle with cold-pressed olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste.","Slice the pear thinly and add to the salad for a sweet crunch.","Cut the rested lamb into thin slices and arrange on top of the salad.","Serve the salad with the crispy rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A plate with a mix of Boston Bibb lettuce, romaine lettuce, rocket, thinly sliced pear, topped with sliced spiced lamb and served with a piece of crispy wholegrain rye bread on the side, drizzled with olive oil"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Papaya Porridge Pizzazz","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Milk","quantity":200},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Porridge Oats","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 160 g","quantity":160},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Nutmeg Ground","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":1}],"method":["In a small saucepan, bring the milk to a gentle simmer over low heat.","Add the porridge oats to the milk, stirring well.","Dice the papaya into small cubes and add half of them to the saucepan.","Stir in the cinnamon, nutmeg, cardamom, and ginger powder.","Continue to simmer while stirring occasionally for 10-15 minutes or until the oats are fully cooked and the porridge has thickened to your liking.","Remove from heat, and let it sit for a couple of minutes to cool slightly.","Serve the porridge in a bowl, topped with the remaining papaya cubes."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of creamy porridge oats topped with fresh papaya cubes, seasoned with cinnamon, nutmeg, cardamom, and ginger powder."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spicy Turkey Salad Surprise","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turkey Breast","quantity":155},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Romaine Lettuce","quantity":55},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":50},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Curry Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5}],"method":["Slice the turkey breast into thin strips.","In a bowl, mix together a pinch each of curry powder, cumin powder, and turmeric.","Rub the turkey strips with the spice mix until fully coated.","Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat and pan-fry the turkey strips until fully cooked and golden brown, about 7-8 minutes.","Meanwhile, clean and chop the rocket, romaine, and iceberg lettuce into bite-sized pieces, and toss them in a large bowl.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until it is crispy, then cut it into small cubes to make croutons.","Peel and mince the garlic, and chop the parsley finely.","Toss the salad greens, garlic, and parsley together to create the salad base.","Arrange the spiced turkey strips on top of the salad and serve with the rye bread croutons.","Enjoy the surprise mix of flavors and textures!"],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"a plate with a mixed salad topped with spiced turkey strips, accompanied by crispy rye bread croutons"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Venison Sunrise Symphonie","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Venison","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brussels Sprouts","quantity":85},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Apple 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegetables","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":2},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chinese Five Spice","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1}],"method":["Trim any excess fat from the venison and slice it thinly.","Mince the garlic finely.","Halve the brussels sprouts and steam them until just tender, about 5 minutes.","In a pan, heat the ghee over medium-high heat and fry the venison slices seasoned with a pinch of Chinese five spice, thyme, and rosemary until they develop a nice brown crust, approximately 3 minutes each side.","Once the venison is cooked, remove from the pan and let it rest covered with aluminum foil for a few minutes.","In the same pan, add a bit more ghee if needed and sauté the steamed brussels sprouts with the minced garlic until they are golden and crisp.","Core and thinly slice the apple to be served fresh as a side.","Toast the rye bread to your preferred crispness to accompany the meal."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"Sliced venison seasoned with Chinese five spice, thyme, and rosemary, served with golden brussels sprouts and minced garlic, toasted crispy rye bread, and fresh apple slices on the side."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Eggsotic Veggie Cradle","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"2 Eggs","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brussels Sprouts","quantity":45},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Peppercorn","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Garam Masala Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":5}],"method":["Finely chop the cauliflower, spinach, and Brussels sprouts.","Heat the flax seed oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.","Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.","Toss in the finely chopped vegetables, and sauté until they are slightly tender.","Season with a pinch of turmeric, garam masala powder, and crushed peppercorns, stirring well to combine.","Form small wells in the vegetable mixture and crack an egg into each.","Cover the pan with a lid and allow the eggs to cook until the whites have set but the yolks are still runny.","Toast the piece of crispy rye bread to your preferred level of crunch.","Serve the vegetable and egg mixture over the toasted rye bread.","Garnish with fresh herbs if desired."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A hearty dish of sautéed cauliflower, spinach and Brussels sprouts topped with two sunny side up eggs, seasoned with garlic, peppercorns, garam masala, and turmeric, served on a slice of toasted crispy rye bread, drizzled with flax seed oil."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Zen Morning Mango Porridge","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Porridge Oats","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Milk","quantity":200},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Mango 150 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegetables","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5}],"method":["Cut the mango into small cubes and set aside.","In a saucepan, heat the ghee over medium heat.","Add the oats to the saucepan and toast lightly for about 2 minutes, until they emit a nutty aroma.","Pour in the milk and bring to a gentle simmer, stirring constantly to prevent the oats from sticking to the bottom.","While the oats are cooking, grind the cardamom seeds to a fine powder.","Add the cinnamon and cardamom powder to the porridge and stir well.","Continue cooking the porridge for about 5-7 minutes or until it reaches a creamy consistency.","Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit for a minute to thicken slightly.","Drizzle cold-pressed olive oil over the porridge for a luxurious finish.","Spoon the porridge into a bowl, top with fresh basil leaves and the cubed mango."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of creamy porridge oats topped with bright yellow cubed mango, a sprinkle of cinnamon, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Fusion Fiesta Beans & Greens","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Black Beans","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Bok Choy","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Kohlrabi","quantity":70}],"method":["Rinse the black beans and soak them for at least 4 hours or overnight.","In a pot, fill with water and bring the pre-soaked black beans to a boil. function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Herbed Aerial Chicken with Rye Croutons","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chicken Breast","quantity":155},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":100},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":55},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Dill","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Mustard Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1}],"method":["Season the chicken breast with a pinch each of salt, pepper, rosemary, dill, and crushed mustard seeds.","Heat ghee in a skillet over medium heat and sear the chicken breast for about 6 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked through.","While the chicken is cooking, prepare the salad by chopping the iceberg lettuce and rocket, and tossing them in a bowl with a drizzle of cold-pressed olive oil.","Thinly slice the wholegrain rye bread, toast it in the oven until crispy to make rye croutons.","Once the chicken is done, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into strips.","Mix the chicken strips with the salad and top with the rye croutons.","Garnish with some freshly minced garlic and serve immediately."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Herbed chicken breast served over a bed of iceberg lettuce and rocket, topped with homemade rye croutons and seasoned with dill, rosemary, mustard seeds, salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil, garnished with freshly minced garlic."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Zen Garden Soybean Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"SoyBeans","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Green olives","quantity":10},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":20},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Fennel Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Lemongrass","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Peach 1","quantity":1}],"method":["Begin by soaking the soybeans in water for at least 4 hours to soften.","Preheat your oven to 180 degrees C (355 degrees F). function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Fusion Bountiful Flageolet Beans Feast","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flageolet Beans","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":80},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Apple 1","quantity":120},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Coriander Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegetables","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":3}],"method":["Rinse the flageolet beans and soak them in water overnight.","The next day, drain and rinse the flageolet beans, then place them in a pot with plenty of water and bring to a boil. Serve it on the side to enjoy with the Flageolet Bean Feast."],"cookingTime":90,"imagePrompt":"A hearty plate filled with cooked flageolet beans, tender cauliflower and carrot pieces, diced green apple, garnished with freshly chopped parsley and a piece of crispy rye bread as a side."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Duck Breast Oasis with Herb Cascade","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Duck Breast","quantity":155},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Romaine Lettuce","quantity":80},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":75},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":2},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chilli Flakes","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.","Season the duck breast with salt, sweet paprika powder, thyme, and chilli flakes.","In a hot pan, sear the duck breast skin-side down for 6-7 minutes until the skin is golden and crispy, then turn and cook for another 4-5 minutes or until desired doneness.","Remove the duck from the pan and let it rest for 10 minutes.","In the meantime, prepare the salad by tossing together romaine lettuce, rocket, and finely chopped parsley.","For the dressing, mix cold-pressed olive oil with minced garlic and rosemary, then season with salt and drizzle over the salad.","Slice the duck breast and serve on top of the seasoned salad.","Serve with a slice of wholegrain rye bread on the side for added texture and wholesomeness."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"Sliced duck breast on top of a bed of romaine lettuce and rocket with rosemary, parsley, and a slice of wholegrain rye bread on the side, with a drizzle of olive oil and garlic dressing"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Roast Beef Botanic Salad","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Roast Beef","quantity":105},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Boston Bibb Lettuce Butter Lettuce","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lollo Rosso Lettuce","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Dandelion Greens","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cucumber","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 155 g","quantity":155},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Dill","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5}],"method":["Thinly slice the roast beef and set it aside.","Wash and dry all lettuces—Boston Bibb, Lollo Rosso, dandelion greens, and iceberg—and tear them into bite-size pieces.","Peel and thinly slice the cucumber and ginger.","Slice the papaya into thin strips.","In a large salad bowl, combine the sliced beef, prepared lettuces, cucumber, and papaya.","Drizzle with flax seed oil and toss gently to combine.","Serve the Roast Beef Botanic Salad with a sprinkle of salt, pepper, dill, and parsley.","Enjoy the refreshing flavors!"],"cookingTime":10,"imagePrompt":"A refreshing bowl of salad featuring thinly sliced roast beef, Boston Bibb lettuce, Lollo Rosso lettuce, dandelion greens, iceberg lettuce, sliced cucumber, thin strips of papaya, drizzled with flax seed oil and garnished with salt, pepper, dill, and parsley."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Eggstravaganza Veggie Nest","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"2 Eggs","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower Leaves","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Kohlrabi Knol-Khol","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Leek","quantity":45},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Fennel Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Sage","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat your oven to 190 degrees Celsius (375 degrees Fahrenheit).","Finely chop the cauliflower leaves, kohlrabi, and leek, then sauté them in a pan with flax seed oil until soft and slightly caramelized.","Season the sautéed vegetables with fennel powder, sage, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Papaya Yogurt Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Whole Milk Natural Yogurt plain 3.8% fat","quantity":200},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 160 g","quantity":160},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Honey","quantity":20}],"method":["Peel the papaya, remove the seeds, and cut the flesh into small cubes.","Mince the fresh ginger and set aside.","In a small bowl, mix together the honey, cinnamon, and cardamom.","Gently fold the honey and spice mixture into the whole milk natural yogurt until fully combined.","Layer half the spiced yogurt at the bottom of a serving dish.","Scatter the cubed papaya over the yogurt.","Top the papaya with the rest of the spiced yogurt.","Sprinkle the minced ginger over the top for an extra kick.","Chill in the refrigerator for 15 minutes to let the flavors meld together.","Serve chilled and enjoy the delightful blend of flavors."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"a serving dish with layers of whole milk natural yogurt mixed with honey, ginger, cinnamon, and cardamom, topped with cubed papaya and sprinkled with minced ginger"}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Morning Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Goat Milk","quantity":200},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Porridge Oats","quantity":45},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Cantaloupe 110 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Nutmeg Ground","quantity":5}],"method":["In a small saucepan, heat the goat milk over medium heat until warm.","Add the porridge oats to the goat milk and cook, stirring occasionally, until the oats are soft and the mixture has thickened, about 5 minutes.","While the oats are cooking, peel and dice the cantaloupe into small pieces.","Stir cinnamon, ginger powder, and nutmeg ground into the oat mixture for a fragrant spice infusion.","Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the spiced oatmeal cool for a couple of minutes.","Serve the oatmeal in a bowl and top with the diced cantaloupe.","Sprinkle an additional pinch of cinnamon and nutmeg over the oatmeal for an extra burst of flavor."],"cookingTime":10,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of creamy porridge made with goat milk and topped with diced cantaloupe, and a sprinkle of cinnamon, ginger powder, and nutmeg ground."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Chickpea Sprout Salad","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chickpea Sprouts","quantity":150},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lollo Rosso Lettuce","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Coriander Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Lemon Juice","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":60}],"method":["Rinse the chickpea sprouts thoroughly in cold water and drain.","Wash and dry the Lollo Rosso and Iceberg lettuce leaves, then tear them into bite-sized pieces.","Combine the lettuce and chickpea sprouts in a salad bowl.","Peel and finely mince the garlic and ginger.","Crush the coriander seeds with a mortar and pestle for a more intense aroma.","In a small bowl, whisk together the flax seed oil, minced garlic, minced ginger, coriander seeds, lemon juice, salt, and pepper to create the dressing.","Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well to ensure even coating.","Serve the salad with the toasted wholegrain rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A vibrant salad made with Lollo Rosso and Iceberg lettuce, mixed with chickpea sprouts, dressed in a flavorful spiced flax seed oil dressing, and served with crunchy wholegrain rye bread."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Nectarine Oatmeal","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Milk","quantity":195},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Porridge Oats","quantity":35},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Nectarine 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Garam Masala Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cloves","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":1}],"method":["Begin by slicing the nectarine into thin pieces, discarding the pit.","In a small saucepan, bring the milk to a low simmer over medium heat.","Once the milk is heated, add in the porridge oats and stir consistently for 3-5 minutes or until the oats begin to soften and the mixture thickens.","Reduce the heat to low and add a pinch of cinnamon, garam masala powder, cloves, and cardamom to the mixture, stirring well to combine the spices.","Continue to cook for another 2-3 minutes, making sure the spices are evenly distributed through the oatmeal.","Once the oatmeal is cooked to your desired consistency, remove from heat.","Serve the oatmeal in a bowl, topping it with the fresh nectarine slices."],"cookingTime":10,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of spiced oatmeal topped with fresh slices of nectarine and sprinkled with cinnamon, garam masala powder, cloves, and cardamom"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Shepherd's Garden Delight","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sheep's Cream Cheese","quantity":75},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Savoy Cabbage","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chilli","quantity":1}],"method":["Wash and finely shred the savoy cabbage, and dice the red capsicum.","Slice the cherry tomatoes in halves.","Mince the garlic and chop the chilli.","Heat the cold-pressed olive oil in a pan over medium heat.","Add the shredded cabbage, diced red capsicum, minced garlic, and chopped chilli to the pan and sautÃ© for about 3-4 minutes.","Add a pinch of chilli flakes, and continue to sautÃ© until the vegetables are tender, but still crisp.","Remove the pan from heat, and let it cool for a minute before blending in the Sheep's Cream Cheese to create a creamy vegetable mix.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until it is nice and crispy.","Spread the creamy vegetable mix on the toasted rye bread.","Garnish with fresh parsley and serve immediately."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"Colourful breakfast toast topped with a creamy mix of sauteed savoy cabbage, red capsicum, cherry tomatoes, minced garlic, chopped chilli, and sheep's cream cheese garnished with fresh parsley, served on crispy wholegrain rye bread."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Anchovy Harvest","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Anchovy","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Choko","quantity":100},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Apple 1","quantity":120},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5}],"method":["Begin by finely chopping the Choko and Cauliflower into small bite-sized pieces.","Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat and add the Cold-pressed Olive Oil.","Saute the Choko and Cauliflower until they start to soften and develop a slight golden color.","Add the Anchovy to the pan, breaking it up with a spatula, and continue to cook until it starts to melt into the vegetables.","Core and thinly slice the Apple, and add it to the pan, tossing to combine it with the other ingredients.","Allow the mixture to cook for about 5 minutes, or until the apples are slightly softened but still retain a crunch.","Toast the Crispy Rye Bread to a desired texture.","Serve the sauteed mix on top of the toasted Crispy Rye Bread as an open-faced sandwich, with the Choko, Cauliflower, Anchovy, and Apple forming a harmonious balance of flavors."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"An open-faced Crispy Rye Bread sandwich with a colorful mix of sauteed Choko, Cauliflower, Apple, and Anchovy, drizzled with Cold-pressed Olive Oil"}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Duck à la Monet's Garden","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Duck Breast","quantity":130},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Frisee","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Romaine Lettuce","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Oak Leaf Lettuce","quantity":50},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":2},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Bay Leaf","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Star Anise","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Dill","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":15},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Prunes dried 30 g","quantity":1}],"method":["Begin by marinating the duck breast. Crush the bay leaf, star anise, a pinch of cinnamon, and cardamom in a mortar. Mix in a pinch of salt, pepper, dill, and ginger. Rub this mixture onto the duck breast and let it marinate for at least 30 minutes.","Preheat a frying pan on medium heat with native coconut oil. Fry the marinated duck breast for 6-8 minutes each side or until the internal temperature reaches 62C (145F) for medium-rare. Allow the duck to rest before slicing.","While the duck is resting, prepare the salad. Wash and combine frisee, romaine lettuce, and red oak leaf lettuce in a salad bowl. Once toasted, let it cool slightly and then slice diagonally into large pieces.","Slice the rested duck breast thinly and lay the slices over the mixed salad greens.","Chop the dried prune into thin slivers and sprinkle over the salad for a sweet contrast.","Serve the duck and salad immediately with the crispy rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":45,"imagePrompt":"A sliced marinated duck breast laid over a bed of mixed frisee, romaine and red oak leaf lettuce, with diagonal slices of toasted crispy rye bread on the side, and slivers of dried prunes scattered on top."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Nutty Garden Scramble","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Almonds","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sunflower Seeds","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Button Mushrooms","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus green","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Bok Choy","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil for frying","quantity":15}],"method":["Chop the button mushrooms, asparagus, and bok choy into small pieces.","Mince the garlic and ginger.","Heat the coconut oil in a pan over medium heat.","Add the minced garlic and ginger to the pan and sauté until fragrant.","Add the chopped mushrooms, asparagus, and bok choy to the pan and cook until they begin to soften.","Crush the almonds and sunflower seeds in a mortar and pestle or food processor until they are coarsely ground.","Sprinkle the crushed nuts and seeds over the vegetables in the pan.","Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.","Cook everything together, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are fully cooked and the nuts are slightly toasted.","Serve hot as a nutritious and flavorful breakfast scramble."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A visually appealing breakfast scramble with chopped button mushrooms, asparagus, bok choy, crushed almonds and sunflower seeds, sautéed with garlic and ginger, and seasoned to perfection."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Steak Serenade with Veggie Medley","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Steak Beef","quantity":120},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus white","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Thyme","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Peppercorn","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mango 130 g","quantity":130}],"method":["Preheat a grill or pan to high heat.","Season the steak beef with salt, rosemary, thyme, and crushed peppercorns on both sides.","Grill the steak to your preferred doneness, approximately 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Veggie Stuffed Egg Roll","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"2 Eggs","quantity":2},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Avocado","quantity":60},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Brussels Sprouts","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turnip","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":15}],"method":["Boil the eggs for 10 minutes, then cool, peel, and chop into small pieces.","In a bowl, mash the avocado and mix in the chopped boiled eggs.","In a pan, saute the spinach, Brussels sprouts, and turnip until tender, then add the cayenne pepper for heat.","Lay out the wholegrain rye bread slices, spread the avocado and egg mixture over each slice, and then top with the sauteed vegetables.","Roll up each slice into a tight roll, and secure with toothpicks if needed.","Bake in a preheated oven at 180�C (356�F) for 10 minutes, or until the rolls are crispy and golden brown.","Serve the veggie stuffed egg rolls with a side of mixed greens or a light salad."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"Veggie stuffed egg rolls with avocado, sauteed spinach, and Brussels sprouts, rolled up in wholegrain rye bread, served with mixed greens"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Superfood Medley","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pumpkin Seeds","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Sunflower Seeds","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":15},{"unit":"slice","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1}],"method":["Toast the pumpkin and sunflower seeds in a dry skillet over medium heat until they become fragrant and slightly golden, then set aside.","Cut the broccoli into small florets and blanch them in boiling water for 2 minutes, then cool immediately in ice water to retain their bright green color.","Halve the cherry tomatoes and season with a pinch of salt.","Toast the slice of wholegrain rye bread until it's crisp and warmed through.","Assemble the Sunrise Superfood Medley by laying the toasted wholegrain rye bread at the bottom of the plate.","Top the rye bread with the blanched broccoli and scatter the seasoned cherry tomatoes on and around the broccoli, creating a colorful and nutritious medley.","Sprinkle the toasted pumpkin and sunflower seeds over the top for added crunch and protein.","Serve and enjoy this vibrant superfood medley for a nutritious and delicious start to your day."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"A colorful medley of blanched broccoli, seasoned cherry tomatoes, and toasted pumpkin and sunflower seeds arranged on a crispy slice of wholegrain rye bread, creating a vibrant and nutritious breakfast plate."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Veal Serenade with Mango Tango","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Veal","quantity":130},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curly Endive","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Frisee","quantity":65},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Mango 150 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":15},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Fennel Seeds","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lemongrass","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":1}],"method":["Rub the veal with a mixture of crushed cumin seeds, grated ginger, minced garlic, turmeric, coriander powder, fennel seeds, and salt. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Bean Harmony in Veggie Tune","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Adzuki Beans","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cherry Tomatoes","quantity":50},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Blueberries 105 g","quantity":105}],"method":["Soak the Adzuki Beans overnight in plenty of water.","Drain and rinse the beans, then place them in a pot with fresh water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for about 40 minutes or until tender.","While the beans are cooking, finely slice the spinach, dice the carrots, and halve the cherry tomatoes. Mince the garlic and set aside.","In a skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant.","Add the cumin seeds and a pinch of turmeric to the skillet and stir for about a minute to release their flavors.","Toss in the carrots, and cook for 5 minutes before adding the cherry tomatoes, spinach, and a pinch of rosemary. Drizzle with flax seed oil and add a light sprinkle of salt and pepper.","Toast a piece of wholegrain rye bread until it's crispy.","Finely chop the garlic and sprinkle over the salad for an added aromatic punch.","Serve the salad topped with mutton slices and garnish with fresh blueberries for a sweet and savory balance."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"Thinly sliced mutton atop a bed of romaine lettuce, rocket, and boston bibb lettuce, garnished with blueberries and a side of toasted wholegrain rye bread, seasoned with garlic, and drizzled with flax seed oil"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Lentil Elegance with a Mango Twist","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Red Lentils","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus green","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":25},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"BokChoy","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Onion","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mango 165 g","quantity":165},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1}],"method":["Rinse red lentils thoroughly and soak them in water for about 15 minutes before draining.","Heat a pinch of ghee in a pot, add minced garlic, finely chopped onion, and a pinch of cayenne pepper. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Bean Symphony with Verdant Tones","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Kidney Beans","quantity":75},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Artichokes canned or frozen","quantity":40},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":2},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Native Coconut Oil forfrying","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Paprika Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Apricot dried 30 g","quantity":30},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1}],"method":["Rinse the kidney beans and soak in water for a few hours or overnight, then drain and rinse again.","Boil the kidney beans in fresh water for about 60 minutes until tender, and set aside.","Preheat a pan with coconut oil over medium heat.","Finely chop the garlic and saute until fragrant.","Cut the broccoli and carrots into bite-sized pieces and add them to the pan.","Slice the canned artichokes and add them to the pan as well.","Season the vegetables with turmeric, paprika powder, cumin powder, salt, and pepper.","Stir-fry the vegetables until they are tender but still crisp, about 7-8 minutes.","Chop the dried apricots into small pieces and toss them with the cooked vegetables for an additional 2 minutes.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until it's crispy.","Serve the stir-fried vegetables and kidney beans with a slice of toasted rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":90,"imagePrompt":"stir-fried kidney beans and mixed vegetables with turmeric, paprika, cumin, garlic topped with crispy toasted wholegrain rye bread and chopped dried apricots on a plate"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Chickpea Crunch Bowl","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chickpeas","quantity":55},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Broccoli","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"RedCabbage","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Carrots","quantity":50},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Crispy Rye Bread","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Apricot dried 30 g","quantity":15}],"method":["Soak and cook the chickpeas until tender, then drain and let them cool down.","Cut the broccoli and red cabbage into small florets and thin slices respectively, and steam until just tender.","Grate the carrots and set aside.","In a small pan, dry roast the cumin powder and turmeric for a minute until fragrant.","Mince the garlic and ginger and saute in a pan with a little water until golden brown.","Mix the chickpeas, broccoli, red cabbage, grated carrots, roasted spices, and sauteed garlic and ginger together in a bowl.","Toast the crispy rye bread until it's extra crunchy and break into 'croutons'.","Chop the dried apricot into small pieces and add to the salad.","Toss to combine all ingredients well, then sprinkle the rye bread 'croutons' over the top of the salad just before serving."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of colorful chickpea salad with broccoli, red cabbage, grated carrots, toasted cumin and turmeric spices, topped with rye bread croutons and bits of dried apricot"}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Beans 'n' Greens Symphony","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lima Beans","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Artichokes canned or frozen","quantity":65},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Apple 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegeteables","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1}],"method":["Rinse the Lima beans and soak them overnight in water.","Drain the beans and place them in a saucepan with fresh water. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Buccaneer's Beef & Bounty Salad","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Roast Beef","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Curly Endive","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Romaine Lettuce","quantity":65},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":50},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Apple 1","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Hungarian Paprika","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Peppercorn","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cayenne Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"ml","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":15},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Dill","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Horseradish","quantity":1}],"method":["Thinly slice the roast beef and set aside.","Wash and dry the curly endive, romaine lettuce, and rocket. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Spiced Buffalo Milk Porridge","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Buffalo Milk","quantity":175},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Oatmeal","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Blackberries 85 g","quantity":85},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":2},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cardamom","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Flax Seed Oil for Salads","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Rosemary","quantity":1}],"method":["In a small saucepan, heat the buffalo milk over medium heat until warm.","Stir in the oatmeal and cinnamon, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until the oatmeal is soft and has absorbed most of the milk.","Add a pinch of ground cardamom and rosemary, and continue cooking for another 2 minutes.","Serve the porridge in a bowl, and top it with blackberries.","Drizzle with a sprinkle of flax seed oil before serving."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of creamy oatmeal porridge made with buffalo milk, topped with blackberries, a sprinkle of cinnamon, cardamom, and rosemary, and served in a cozy breakfast setting."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Mango Maple Oatmeal Surprise","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Milk","quantity":200},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Porridge Oats","quantity":45},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Mango 150 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cinnamon","quantity":2},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Nutmeg Ground","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Maple Syrup","quantity":15},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Chia Seeds","quantity":10}],"method":["Begin by dicing the mango into small cubes.","In a non-stick pan, warm up the milk over low heat.","Add the porridge oats and stir gently to combine.","Cook the oats on low heat, stirring occasionally, until they have absorbed most of the milk and reached the desired consistency, about 5-7 minutes.","Stir in the cinnamon, nutmeg, and maple syrup into the oat mixture, and cook for another 2 minutes.","Turn off the heat and let the oatmeal rest for a minute.","Serve the warm oatmeal in a bowl, topped with fresh diced mango and a sprinkle of chia seeds."],"cookingTime":15,"imagePrompt":"A bowl of creamy oatmeal topped with fresh diced mango, a sprinkle of cinnamon, nutmeg, and chia seeds, with a drizzle of maple syrup, on a rustic wooden table."}

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Piquant Porcine Pastoral Plate","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Pork Fillet","quantity":145},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Iceberg Lettuce","quantity":75},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Romaine Lettuce","quantity":50},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Rocket","quantity":20},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Strawberries 125 g","quantity":125},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli Flakes","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Mustard Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":10},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Basil","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Curry Powder","quantity":1}],"method":["Season the pork fillet with a pinch of salt, pepper, curry powder, and mustard seeds.","Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat and grill the pork fillet for 5-6 minutes on each side or until fully cooked through.","Meanwhile, wash the iceberg lettuce, romaine lettuce, and rocket, and tear into bite-sized pieces.","Combine the lettuces and rocket in a large salad bowl, then add the sliced strawberries.","Whisk together 10 grams of cold-pressed olive oil with minced garlic, basil, and chilli flakes to create a dressing.","Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to evenly coat.","Slice the cooked pork fillet into thin strips and arrange on top of the salad.","Serve with a slice of wholegrain rye bread on the side."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"Grilled pork fillet slices on a bed of mixed salad with iceberg lettuce, romaine, rocket, sliced strawberries, and wholegrain rye bread topped with a homemade dressing of cold-pressed olive oil, basil, garlic, and chilli flakes."}

function_call.arguments: {"name":"Bohemia Bean Fiesta","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Lima Beans","quantity":90},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Redcapsicum","quantity":30},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Cauliflower","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Papaya 175 g","quantity":175},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Parsley","quantity":5},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cold-pressed Olive Oil for Salads","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chinese Five Spice","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Chilli Powder","quantity":1}],"method":["Rinse the Lima Beans and soak them overnight in water.","Drain and rinse the beans, then cook in fresh water for about 45-60 minutes until tender.","While beans are cooking, wash the Spinach and Redcapsicum and chop them into bite-sized pieces.","Cut the Cauliflower into small florets and steam them until slightly tender, for about 5 minutes.","Peel the Papaya and cut into bite-sized cubes.","In a large bowl, combine the cooked Lima Beans, Spinach, Redcapsicum, steamed Cauliflower, and diced Papaya.","Mince the Garlic and finely chop the Parsley, then add these to the salad.","Season with a pinch of Salt, Chinese Five Spice, and Chilli Powder.","Drizzle with a pinch of Cold-pressed Olive Oil and toss everything together lightly.","Serve the Bohemia Bean Fiesta at room temperature along with a slice of Wholegrain Rye Bread on the side."],"cookingTime":75,"imagePrompt":"A colorful salad comprised of Lima Beans, Spinach, Redcapsicum, Cauliflower, Papaya cubes, finely chopped Parsley, and a slice of Wholegrain Rye Bread, seasoned with Chinese Five Spice and Chilli Powder, and drizzled with Cold-pressed Olive Oil."}

Cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables have wilted and softened but still have a slight crunch.","While the vegetables are cooking, toast the pumpkin seeds and sunflower seeds in a dry pan over medium heat for 3-4 minutes until they're fragrant and lightly golden. function_call.arguments: {"name":"Sunrise Delight Scramble","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Paneer","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"BrusselsSprouts","quantity":35},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus green","quantity":35},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Wholegrain Rye Bread","quantity":1},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Cantaloupe 95 g","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Coriander Powder","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Cumin Seeds","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Turmeric","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ginger","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Mustard Seeds","quantity":5}],"method":["Crumble the paneer into a bowl and set aside.","Finely chop the Brussels sprouts and asparagus into small pieces.","Grate the ginger finely.","Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and dry roast the cumin seeds and mustard seeds until fragrant, about 1 minute.","Add the chopped Brussels sprouts and asparagus to the pan, stirring occasionally for about 3-4 minutes or until they start to soften.","Stir in the crumbled paneer, grated ginger, turmeric, coriander powder, and a splash of water if needed, to prevent sticking.","Cook for another 5 minutes, ensuring the paneer is heated through and the spices are well mixed in.","Toast the wholegrain rye bread until golden brown.","Serve the scramble on top of the toasted rye bread.","Cut the cantaloupe into slices and serve on the side for a fresh finish."],"cookingTime":20,"imagePrompt":"breakfast scramble with crumbled paneer, Brussels sprouts, asparagus on toasted wholegrain rye bread, with a side of cantaloupe slices"}

functions.name: generateRecipe
functions.description: Generates a recipe with a name, method, list of ingredients with quantities, and cooking time.

name.description: A very creative name for the recipe, something a reader wouldn't expect. Limited to 30 characters

items.description: Represents a single ingredient, specifying its name, quantity, and unit of measurement.

ingredient.description: The name exactly as it appeared in the ingredient list.

quantity.description: The quantity of the ingredient required. Always use short notation such a g, kg, ml, etc. Round up to the nearest 5 if using grams.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the quantity, such as 'grams', 'pieces', etc.

ingredients.description: An array of ingredients for the recipe.

items.description: A step in the method to prepare the recipe.

method.description: The method to prepare the recipe, represented as an array of steps.

cookingTime.description: The time it takes to cook the recipe, in minutes.

imagePrompt.description: A prompt that can be passed to DALL-E to generate an accurate image of the recipe, ensure to include all the ingredients on the image.

messages.content: You are an AI that writes recipes from provided ingredients that follow the Metabolic Balance Principles.

Write a Breakfasts recipe. You must use 45 grams of Feta Cheese Sheep. You must use 80 grams of Vegetable. You can add Fruit. Stick exactly to the weights provided. The ingredients are: "Pickled gherkins sugar free, Asparagus white, Okra, Aniseed, Green olives, Feta Cheese Sheep, Coriander Seeds, Sage, Artichokes, Bay Leaf, Silverbeet, Ginger, Carrots, Avocado, Peppercorn, Zucchini, Garden Cress, Bok Choy, Garlic, Leek, Curry Leaf, Broccoli, Garam Masala Powder, Coriander Powder, Turmeric, Celeriac, Chanterelle mushrooms, Spring Onions, Fennel Powder, Savoy Cabbage, Cayenne Pepper, Swede, Chilli Flakes, Fennel Seeds, Kale, White & brown mushrooms, Parsley, Allspice, Cauliflower leaves, Fenugreek Seed, Rosemary, Ghee for hot vegetables, Garlic Powder, Cardamom, Mustard powder, Ginger Powder, Chinese Five Spice, Paprika Sweet Powder, Fennel, Chilli Powder, CherryTomatoes, Horseradish, Cumin Seeds, Basil, Mustard Seeds, Cumin Powder, Radish, Chilli, Kohlrabi Cabbage Turnip, Native Coconut Oil forfrying, Nutmeg Ground, Brussels Sprouts, Sorrel, Caraway Seed, Pear 1, Sauerkraut, Lemongrass, Choko, Pepperonicini, Thyme, Onion Powder, Horseradish, Flax Seed Oil for Salads, Green capsicum, Spinach, Oregano Leaf, Cinnamon, Cloves, Curry Powder, Hungarian Paprika, Parsley Leaf Powder, Star Anise, Paprika Powder, Horseradish Powder, Dill, Celery Seed". Don't just stick to one ingredient, use a variety of ingredients. Ensure all the recipes have very creative names.

function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Colorful Feta Breakfast Frittata","ingredients":[{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Feta Cheese Sheep","quantity":45},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Asparagus white","quantity":40},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"CherryTomatoes","quantity":40}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).","Grease a 9-inch pie dish with oil or butter.","Wash the asparagus and cherry tomatoes, then chop the asparagus into 1-inch pieces and halve the tomatoes.","Arrange the asparagus and cherry tomatoes in the prepared pie dish.","Sprinkle the feta cheese over the vegetables.","In a bowl, whisk together 2 eggs and 2 egg whites with a pinch of salt.","Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables and feta in the pie dish.","Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the eggs are set and the top is slightly golden.","Allow to cool for a few minutes, then slice and serve.","Garnish with fresh herbs for extra flavor and color."],"cookingTime":30,"imagePrompt":"A colorful feta breakfast frittata, baked to perfection and garnished with fresh herbs."}

Write a Dinners recipe. You must use Eggs. You must use 95 grams of Starch. You must use 140 grams of Vegetable. Stick exactly to the weights provided. The ingredients are: "Paprika Sweet Powder, Caraway Seed, Horseradish, Broccoli, Spinach, Asparagus white, Fenugreek Seed, Horseradish Powder, Oregano Leaf, Ghee for hot vegetables, Pepper, Black olives, Sorrel, Chilli, Fennel Powder, Celeriac, Cumin Seeds, Paprika Powder, Mustard powder, Curry Powder, Dill, Cardamom, Savoy Cabbage, Nutmeg Ground, Lemongrass, Hungarian Paprika, Green Cabbage, 1 Eggs, Silverbeet, Native Coconut Oil forfrying, Cayenne Pepper, Bay Leaf, Chanterellemushrooms, Flax Seed Oil for Salads, Onion Powder, Coriander Seeds, Ginger, Potato, Peppercorn, Cumin Powder, Cloves, Parsley, Parsley Root and Leaves, Kale, Chilli Powder, Allspice, Ginger Powder, Parsley Leaf Powder, RedCabbage, Chilli Flakes, Cinnamon, Brussels Sprouts, Watercress, Basil, Salt, Pepperonicini, Garlic, Leek, Mustard Seeds, Carrots, Garam Masala Powder, Fennel Seeds, Porcini mushrooms, Fennel, White & brown mushrooms, Celery Seed, Kohlrabi Cabbage Turnip, Okra, Avocado, Greencapsicum, Rosemary, Chicory Belgium Endive, Thyme, Zucchini, Garlic Powder, Artichokes canned or frozen, Star Anise, Chinese Five Spice, Green Beans, Curry Leaf, Aniseed, Cauliflower, Sage, Coriander Powder, Sauerkraut, Radish, Turmeric". function_call.name: generateRecipe
function_call.arguments: {"name":"Vibrant Veggie Frittata","ingredients":[{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"1 Eggs","quantity":1},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Celeriac","quantity":95},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Spinach","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Leek","quantity":70},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Paprika Sweet Powder","quantity":5},{"unit":"g","ingredient":"Ghee for hot vegetables","quantity":15},{"unit":"piece(s)","ingredient":"Garlic","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Pepper","quantity":1},{"unit":"pinch","ingredient":"Salt","quantity":1}],"method":["Preheat the oven to 180C (350F).","Peel and grate the celeriac, then thinly slice the leek.","Heat ghee in an ovenproof skillet over medium heat. Sautee the grated celeriac and sliced leek until they start to soften.","Add the spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted.","In a small bowl, whisk the egg with paprika sweet powder, salt, and pepper.","Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables in the skillet.","Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 15 minutes or until the frittata is set and lightly golden on top.","Slice into wedges and serve warm, garnished with fresh herbs if desired."],"cookingTime":25,"imagePrompt":"ovenproof skillet filled with a frittata, topped with spinach, celeriac, leek, and paprika, golden in color, with steam rising from the surface"}
